Summary: UFO coming in and out of ocean
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Rincon
There was one other sighting in Rincon on or around December 31st 1970
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile surfing in Rincon, P.R.- Around 6.00 A.M., three disk shaped objects entered the water about 1 mile from where we were waiting to catch waves. We did not make much of it since we were close to Ramey AFB. This happened on two ocassions as I recall it. As the years passed by,I realized that we do not have that technology- I forgott to mention that this objects came out of the water at an incredible rate of speed after some 30 min. under water. This event was witnessed by 10 to 12 surfers that were there at 600. am. I remember telling my father, at that time he was a college professor and he advised me not to talk about it because it might be a secret weapon against the communists-Cubans! Now I am 54 yrs. old, and that was no military weapon! What it was, only God knows!
